fr.pixdad.Game

Class FightingScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.pixdad.Game.tiled.maps.TiledScreen
      • fr.pixdad.Game.fight.states.FightingScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class FightingScreen
extends TiledScreen
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    Implementation of the Screen interface, extending TiledScreen class.

    Instanciate a fight between two players, on a board.
    Instanciate a state machine which contains the logic of the fight, see FightingScreenState enum

    Handles the different entities (board, cursor, fighters) and the UI
